originalText.text: Always a great experience! The staff is super helpful, accommodating, and keeps things running smoothly.  In particular, TJ welcomes me and my guests in with positivity and encouragement, especially before cold plunge sessions.  He also helps me book appointments that fit my schedule.  Overall, having a Reset membership is the way to go and the nurses and staff will take care of the rest.

text.text: Always a great experience! The staff is super helpful, accommodating, and keeps things running smoothly. originalText.text: Reset by Therabody is my go-to place for a wellness day-cation in NYC. I've been a member for over 3 months and noticed significant improvements in sleep and energy levels. From Whole Body Red Light Therapy to Contrast Therapy — it's tough to pick a favorite. Appointment bookings are done online and if I ever need to change or modify my appointment, the Reset team is a call or text away. The Reset team is friendly and lively. I'm glad I joined!

text.text: Reset by Therabody is my go-to place for a wellness day-cation in NYC. I've been a member for over 3 months and noticed significant improvements in sleep and energy levels. From Whole Body Red Light Therapy to Contrast Therapy — it's tough to pick a favorite. Appointment bookings are done online and if I ever need to change or modify my appointment, the Reset team is a call or text away. The Reset team is friendly and lively. I'm glad I joined!

originalText.text: I had my first experience at Reset and I absolutely loved it. Quinten really took care of me and answered every question I had.  He really went above and beyond and I cannot recommend him enough. Naomi gave me an excellent B12 shot and took great care into making sure I was comfortable.

text.text: I had my first experience at Reset and I absolutely loved it. Quinten really took care of me and answered every question I had.  He really went above and beyond and I cannot recommend him enough. Naomi gave me an excellent B12 shot and took great care into making sure I was comfortable.

originalText.text: Such an amazing addition to the neighborhood! I have been coming since day one, and couldn’t be more impressed with the kind and knowledgeable staff and the number of treatment options! I feel so grateful to be able to have Reset as a part of my daily wellness routine:))

text.text: Such an amazing addition to the neighborhood! I have been coming since day one, and couldn’t be more impressed with the kind and knowledgeable staff and the number of treatment options! I feel so grateful to be able to have Reset as a part of my daily wellness routine:))

originalText.text:
Reset by Therabody, is definitely a State of the Art High Tech Wellness Spa.
Today, people are becoming more in tuned with their body.  Reset
is the place to go for a variety of services that will help to keep their
body in tuned.
When calling for advice on products and services, staff is knowledgeable and pleasant to speak with.
